sentences.en: After five years in remission, he will be considered cured.
sentences.cn: 迈克尔终生治愈的可能性为95%疾病未复发达5年, 则可认为病已经治好.

sentences.en: After six years of remission, cancer reappeared.
sentences.cn: 病情缓解6年后，癌症又复发了。

sentences.en: Brain scans have confirmed that the disease is in remission.
sentences.cn: 脑部扫描已经证实疾病得到了控制。

sentences.en: He did his porridge peacefully , earned his remission and came out.
sentences.cn: 他安分地服刑,获减型出狱.

sentences.en: He was sentenced to five years, but should serve only three with remission.
sentences.cn: 他被判了五年徒刑, 但减刑后仅服刑三年.

sentences.en: Nine patients achieved a complete remission, 2 did so with chemotherapy alone.
sentences.cn: 9名患者完全缓解, 2名与单独化疗效果相同.

sentences.en: Prolonged remission or cure of patients following incomplete removal of their cancers is not uncommon.
sentences.cn: 癌瘤不完全性切除后病人长期缓解或治愈的现象也并不少见.

sentences.en: Remission of sins is promised to those who repent.
Result: 4 patients achieved complete remission. 3 had partial remission.
sentences.cn: 结果: 4例完全缓解, 3例部分缓解,总有效率58%.

sentences.en: Some patients complain of constant pain without real remission.
sentences.cn: 有些病人自述疼痛持续而无真正缓解.

sentences.en: The cancer has gone into remission .
The introduction of infliximab was followed by complete remission of the disease.
sentences.cn: 因此,我们进一步使用了英夫利昔单抗治疗,此后患者病情逐步完全缓解.

sentences.en: The overall remission rates in DDP and CDP group were 78.5 % and 57.1 % respectively.
sentences.cn: 其缓解率在顺铂组及卡铂组分别为78.5%及57.1%.

sentences.en: The patient has been in remission for the past six months.
sentences.cn: 在过去的六个月中，病人的病情已经有所缓解。

sentences.en: The prisoner was given six months'remission for good behaviour.
sentences.cn: 这个囚犯因行为好而获减刑六个月.

sentences.en: With remission for good behaviour, she could be freed in a year.
sentences.cn: 她因为表现良好获得减刑，可能会在一年内重获自由。
